title: Faculity App
description: An application for university students to view schedules, news, and notifications.

features.title: User Authentication & Secure Access
features.description: Implemented a complete authentication system using Firebase, providing secure login, registration, and password recovery functionalities to protect user data.

features.title: Dynamic Schedules & Real-time Updates
features.description: Developed a feature to display dynamic university schedules fetched from a live database. Users receive real-time updates and notifications about any changes.
